an3.84:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
an3.84:4.2: Atha kho aññataro vajjiputtako bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.84:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so vajjiputtako bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an3.84:4.7: “Sakkhissasi pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhituṃ—
an3.84:5.1: Yato kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, adhisīlampi sikkhissasi, adhicittampi sikkhissasi, adhipaññampi sikkhissasi, tassa tuyhaṃ bhikkhu adhisīlampi sikkhato adhicittampi sikkhato adhipaññampi sikkhato rāgo pahīyissati, doso pahīyissati, moho pahīyissati.
an3.84:5.2: So tvaṃ rāgassa pahānā dosassa pahānā mohassa pahānā yaṃ akusalaṃ na taṃ karissasi, yaṃ pāpaṃ na taṃ sevissasī”ti.
an3.84:6.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu aparena samayena adhisīlampi sikkhi, adhicittampi sikkhi, adhipaññampi sikkhi.
an3.84:6.2: Tassa adhisīlampi sikkhato adhicittampi sikkhato adhipaññampi sikkhato rāgo pahīyi, doso pahīyi, moho pahīyi.
an3.84:6.3: So rāgassa pahānā dosassa pahānā mohassa pahānā yaṃ akusalaṃ taṃ nākāsi, yaṃ pāpaṃ taṃ na sevīti.
